scenario_text.value: Why, you...!!!
(Was that Minoru just now?!)
Minoru?! What’s wrong?!
*huff* *huff*... This thing is tough!
Gyaaaaaah!
Minoru! Falcomon! Is that...?!
Stay back Takuma!
Minoru?!

This thing is way stronger than the enemies
we usually fight!
Hold on, I’ll go get Agumon and the others!

Yeah, thanks, man. Me and Falcomon will buy
you some time!
Got it. You’d better not die on me!

Buy time, you say... A bold declaration,
under such circumstances.

Heh, heheh... My legs won’t stop shaking.
Do you think Takuma noticed?

Ho ho, it seems you maintained your cover,
given his response.
...You think? I can’t tell.

Just feels like I’m playing hero, acting all
cool for no reason.

I’m just dragging my childish dreams along,
that’s all...

Ah, but still! I said I’m gonna do it, so
I’mma do it!

Indeed, let us begin, Minoru! We shall stop
the enemy here until the others arrive!
